      • createBallImage

        public static final ij.ImageStack createBallImage()
        Generate a ball of radius 20 in a discrete image of size 50x50x50. Expected surface area is around 5026.

      • createManyBallsImage

        public static final ij.ImageStack createManyBallsImage()
        Generate an image containing 27 balls with same radius. Radius of the ball is 12.61, resulting in a surface area of around 2000.

      • createEulerImage

        public static final ij.ImageStack createEulerImage()
        Generate the 3D test image with 7 labels for measuring Euler Number. Labels: 1: a single blob, with some thickness (Euler = 1) 2: a set of single points (Euler = 8) 3: a single loop, one voxel thickness (Euler = 0) 4: a hollow sphere (Euler = 2)
